name: The Ironsoul
effect: Grants great strength and physical resilience in battle.

name: The Veilstep
effect: Allows the bearer to vanish from sight once per day.

name: The Runeborn
effect: Enhances the speed of arcane regeneration.

name: The Hollow Spark
effect: Greatly boosts mana reserves, but increases magical vulnerability.

name: The Nullbrand
effect: Bestows immense magicka but disables natural recovery.

name: The Mourning Star
effect: Revives the fallen and turns the undead once per day.

name: The Thornkissed
effect: Can charm or paralyze a foe with a single touch once per day.

name: The Obsidian Throne
effect: Grants regeneration and resistance, but increases fire weakness.

name: The Lockspire
effect: Unlocks any barrier and reflects damage once per day.

name: The Stormhoof
effect: Imbues the bearer with unmatched speed and fluidity.

name: The Witherfang
effect: Poisons enemies and cleanses disease, but drains health.
